long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Affire.ai is SaaS management platform for MSP. 
We are providing Shadow IT discovery by monitoring visited SaaS applications via Chrome extension. Based on this information you can understand what software is in use inside your organization.
